name: Git Gold
description:
Use WASD or the arrows to move and the Mouse to throw nearby goblins at villagers. The goblins will follow you where ever you go and return to you after they recover from your toss!

Villagers and debris all hold gold, and eager goblins and ogres are ready to catch your spoils! Hit up @johndoughty6 with a screenshot of your high score!

This game is a spiritual successor to my favorite jam game from the past, Grow Your Hoard. I think if I get positive enough reaction to this one I'll combine them into a single game somehow. Maybe add another jam game to the mix? We'll have to see!
